content:
But when I see the peach blossoms bloom, I know it's spring,
Nothing particularly special about that.
Just another year beginning.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Spring isn't always warm,
As neighbors often say,
"It's a late spring chill."
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content: <color=#695c3a>When did we reach Bond Lv. 4?</color>

content:
I heard Mobai's reminders to everyone lately,
about spring precautions,
but I don't really pay attention to seasons.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
As supernatural cases have become less frequent,
it seems they too follow seasonal patterns,
waning as nature springs back to life.

content:
I just haven't figured out what to say yet.
This topic... let me think it through.
We'll talk about it next time.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
The warmth, when caught off guard,
Suddenly faced with cold—
Perhaps, it leaves a lasting impression.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
I've heard some clients say,
"I love spring",
...{短暂停}Oh, I didn't quite understand it then, that's why I remember it.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊

content:
Since moving here,
This climate, where cold melts away by nature's rules—
Yes, it's something I've grown to love.
info: 闲聊-季节相关闲聊-1004夙夜_单一闲聊
